definitions.title: n. pr. gent. et. terr.
definitions.body: Elam, Ailam, )Elamei=rai, well-known country and people NE. of Lower Tigris (As. Elamtu Dl:Pa 320 ff. COT:Gn 10, 22);—as early invaders of Palestine Ge 14:1, Ge 14:9, allies of Assyr. Is 22:6; foe of Babylon Is 21:2; abode of dispersed Israelites Is 11:11; prophesied against Je 49:34, Je 49:35, Je 49:36, Je 49:36 (Qr, Kt [[עולם]]), v:Je 49:37, v:Je 49:38, v:Je 49:39, Ez Eze 32:24, cf. ´[[כָּל־מַלְכֵי ע]] Je 25:25; called ‘ son ’ of Shem Ge 10:22 (P) = 1Ch 1:17; purely local designation [[הַמְּדִינׇה]] ´[[ע]] Da 8:2.
